metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use Clip - System
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use Clip.exe in Scripts

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.log_provider) = lower('service control manager') AND metadata.event_code = 7045 AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('(clipboard|i')))

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use Clip.exe in Scripts
